info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 12:35AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, central Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 115 AM MDT... At 1235 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Neeoshe Reservoir, or 19 miles north of Lamar, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chivington around 1250 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Brandon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
